gov.usgs.anss.net

Class UdpQueuedServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.usgs.anss.net.UdpQueuedServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class UdpQueuedServer
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is a generalized Client which listens to a UdpPort and puts the messages in a queue. The user sets this up and it keeps putting stuff in the Queue and the user empties the queue with calls to dequeue(). If the queue overflows the data are discarded. Status includes number of discarded packets, packets processed, queue highwater. to be discarded.

      • UdpQueuedServer

        public UdpQueuedServer(java.lang.String locip,
                       int pt,
                       int maxQueue,
                       int maxLength,
                       int rcvbufsize)
                throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Creates a new instance of TraceBufQueuedClient
        Parameters:
        locip - ip address
        pt - port
        maxQueue - Number of messages to reserve space for in queue
        maxLength - Maximum record length for these messages
        rcvbufsize - set rcvbuf size to this value in bytes.
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException
